Elliptic functions
------------------

...................................................

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
.. autofunction:: mpmath.functions.ellipe(x, **kwargs)


Jacobi theta functions
......................

:func:`jtheta`
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

:func:`djtheta`
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.................................................................
